HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Doručování je zajišťováno v pracovních dnech v průběhu běžné pracovní doby.

weekend_delivery.days: Weekend pickup is possible depending on the opening hours of the specific ParcelShop.

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: The e-shop offers three delivery methods: Home Delivery, PPL Parcel Shop pickup, and In-store pickup. PROVIDERS: The exclusive courier for both home and parcel shop delivery is PPL. PRICING: Home delivery costs 99 Kč and is free for orders over 1500 Kč. PPL Parcel Shop delivery costs 69 Kč and is free for orders over 1000 Kč. The price for in-store pickup is not specified. RESTRICTIONS: Delivery is carried out on working days. Information about COD, express delivery, and bulky item shipping is not available. NOTABLE FEATURES: In-store pickup is available 7 days a week (Po-Ne: 8:00-19:00) at their Jičín location. Weekend pickup at PPL Parcel Shops is possible depending on individual shop hours. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented clearly on a dedicated page but is quite basic. It lacks details on delivery timeframes, COD options, and any special handling for bulky items. The information is limited to a single courier.
